languages.text: "Еретиков творят слабость, вольнодумство и нечестивость сердец, а не я. Я их уничтожаю".
"Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."
languages.original_text: "Еретиков творят слабость, вольнодумство и нечестивость сердец, а не я. Я их уничтожаю".

traits.locale_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."

traits.locale_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “是她的软弱、自由思想与内心的邪恶让她变成了异端分子，不是我。”
languages.original_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."

traits.locale_text: “是她的软弱、自由思想与内心的邪恶让她变成了异端分子，不是我。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「弱さ、自由な発想、そして内なる邪悪さが、異端者を生み出すのであり、私が生み出したものではない。私は奴らを滅ぼすのみ」
languages.original_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."

traits.locale_text: 「弱さ、自由な発想、そして内なる邪悪さが、異端者を生み出すのであり、私が生み出したものではない。私は奴らを滅ぼすのみ」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «La debilidad, el librepensamiento y la maldad interior crean a los herejes, no yo. Yo los destruyo».
languages.original_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."

traits.locale_text: «La debilidad, el librepensamiento y la maldad interior crean a los herejes, no yo. Yo los destruyo».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Schwäche, freies Denken und innere Bosheit erzeugen Ketzer, nicht ich. Ich vernichte sie."
languages.original_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."

traits.locale_text: "Schwäche, freies Denken und innere Bosheit erzeugen Ketzer, nicht ich. Ich vernichte sie."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Ce sont la faiblesse, la libre-pensée et la malfaisance du cœur qui créent les hérétiques, pas moi. Moi, je les élimine. »
languages.original_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont la faiblesse, la libre-pensée et la malfaisance du cœur qui créent les hérétiques, pas moi. Moi, je les élimine. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Kâfirleri yaratan şey ben değilim; zayıflık, özgür düşünce ve içlerindeki kötülüktür. Ben onları yok ederim."
languages.original_text: "Weakness, freethinking, and inner wickedness create heretics, not I. I destroy them."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirleri yaratan şey zayıflık, özgür düşünce ve içlerindeki kötülüktür, ben değil. Ben onları yok ederim."
traits.speaker: Chorda
